TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi abstract beforefieldinit EditorZoneBase extends System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.ToolZone
Public MustInherit Class EditorZoneBase Inherits ToolZone

summary.span: 用作充当 控件的容器的所有区域控件的基类。

span.span: Serves as the base class for all zone controls that act as containers for controls.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 类是从类继承的专用区域类，它 为包含控件的派生区域提供一组基本行为 。The class is a specialized zone class that inherits from the class and provides a base set of behaviors for derived zones that contain controls. 还有其他几 类类型; 有关详细信息，请参阅类的概述主题 。There are several other types of classes; for more information, see the overview topic for the class. 与其他工具区域一样， 当页处于普通浏览模式时，区域不可见; 只有当页处于编辑显示模式时，才会显示区域。Like other tool zones, zones are not visible when a page is in normal browse mode; they are visible only when a page is in edit display mode. 与其他工具区域一样， 区域只能包含它们设计为包含 (在这种情况下，控件) 的特殊类型控件 。Also like the other tool zones, zones can only contain the special type of controls they were designed to contain (in this case, controls). 区域为其所包含的编辑控件提供特殊的 UI。The zones provide a special UI for the editing controls they contain. 其中许多 UI 元素都适用于 Web 部件控件集中的所有区域。Many of these UI elements are common to all zones in the Web Parts control set. 有关 Web 部件区域中常见 UI 元素的详细讨论，请参阅类的类概述主题 。For a detailed discussion of the common UI elements in Web Parts zones, see the class overview topic for the class. 由于 类是抽象类，因此不能直接在网页上使用它。Because the class is abstract, you cannot use it directly on a Web page. 相反，你必须使用从类继承的控件 并实现其行为。Instead, you must use a control that inherits from the class and implements its behavior. 你可以使用 Web 部件控件集、控件中提供的派生区域， 也可以派生你自己的自定义 控件。You can either use the derived zone that is provided in the Web Parts control set, the control, or you can derive your own custom control. 类提供一个 (UI) 的公共用户界面，以包含使最终用户能够编辑控件的属性、布局、外观和其他特性的特殊控件 。The class provides a common user interface (UI) to contain special controls that enable end users to edit the properties, layout, appearance, and other attributes of controls. 应用于 UI 的某些属性引用谓词，如 、 和 属性。Some properties that apply to the UI refer to verbs, such as the , , and properties. 谓词是用户在页上执行的常见操作，由按钮、链接、菜单项或其他元素在 UI 中表示。Verbs are common actions carried out by users on a page, and are represented in the UI by buttons, links, menu items, or other elements. 例如，当用户在控件上编辑属性时，他们可以单击应用谓词来保存更改。For example, when users edit properties on a control they can click an apply verb to save the changes. 多个其他属性会影响在编辑 UI 中的各个点上显示的文本。Several other properties affect text that is displayed at various points in the editing UI. 其中包括 、 、 和 属性。These include the , , , and properties. 两个重要属性提供对相关控件的引用。Two important properties provide references to related controls. 属性是 区域中包含的控件的集合。The property is a collection of the controls contained in the zone. 属性是对中包含的控件的对象引用 ，其中可能是 控件或任何其他 ASP.NET 服务器控件、用户控件或当前正在编辑的自定义控件。The property is an object reference to a control contained in a --which might be a control or any other ASP.NET server control, user control, or custom control currently being edited. 最后， 属性引用 与区域关联的对象的一个实例，其中包含外围用户界面元素的样式特征 (称为 chrome) 例如区域中控件的标题和边框样式 。Finally, the property references an instance of an object that is associated with the zone, and that contains style characteristics of the peripheral UI elements (known as chrome) such as title and border styles for controls in the zone. 类的许多方法 都专用于处理其他控件的编辑。A number of the methods of the class are specialized to handle the editing of other controls. 方法将页从编辑显示模式更改回普通浏览视图。The method changes the page from the edit display mode back to a normal browsing view. 方法用于创建 chrome (外围用户界面元素，如边框、动词、图标和在区域中的每个控件周围的标题) 。The method is for creating the chrome (peripheral UI elements such as a border, verbs, icons, and a title) that surrounds each control in the zone. 方法是抽象方法; 派生类将重写它，以创建 区域中包含的所有控件的实例。The method is an abstract method; derived classes override it to create instances of all the controls contained in the zone. 如果 区域中的控件集合因某种编程原因而发生变化，则派生类可以调用方法，这会标记 Web 部件控件集以重新创建和更新控件的集合 。The method can be called by a derived class if the collection of controls in the zone changes for some programmatic reason, which flags the Web Parts control set to recreate and update the collection of controls. `null` 当显示模式从编辑模式更改回浏览模式时，方法用于设置控件的集合。The method is used to set the collection of controls to `null` when the display mode changes from edit mode back to browse mode. 最后， 当 控件进入或离开编辑模式时，该方法用于处理事件。Finally, the method is used for handling the event when a control is either entering or leaving edit mode. 例如，此方法是将控件的属性值 与关联控件中的可编辑值同步的一个方便的位置 。For example, this method is a convenient place to synchronize the property values of a control with the editable values in the associated controls. ## Examples 下面的代码示例演示了类的几个声明性和编程使用 。The following code example demonstrates several declarative and programmatic uses of the class. 由于类是抽象类，因此代码示例使用 Web 部件控件集附带的派生类，其中演示了它从类继承的属性和方法 。Because the class is abstract, the code examples use the derived class that ships with the Web Parts control set, demonstrating the properties and methods that it inherits from the class. 此代码示例包含四个部分：The code example has four parts: - 使您能够更改网页上的显示模式的用户控件。A user control that enables you to change display modes on the Web page. - 包含控件的网页 。A Web page that contains an control. - 一个自定义 类，它演示某些 类成员。A custom class that demonstrates some of the class members. - 说明如何在浏览器中工作。A description of how the example works in a browser. 该用户控件的源代码来自其他主题。The source code for the user control comes from another topic. 要使此代码示例正常运行，你需要从 [演练：更改 Web 部件页上的显示模式](https://msdn.microsoft.com/library/24e42f74-82dc-4c13-8574-130398985fc0) 主题中获取该用户控件的 .ascx 文件，并将该文件放在此代码示例中 .aspx 页面所在的同一文件夹中。For this code example to work, you need to obtain the .ascx file for the user control from the [Walkthrough: Changing Display Modes on a Web Parts Page](https://msdn.microsoft.com/library/24e42f74-82dc-4c13-8574-130398985fc0) topic, and place the file in the same folder as the .aspx page in this code example. 此代码示例的第二部分是包含对控件的声明性引用的网页 。The second part of the code example is a Web page that contains a declarative reference to an control. 页面顶部附近是 `Register` 用户控件的指令。Near the top of the page is a `Register` directive for the user control. 用户控件标记在具有元素的页面中声明 `` 。The user control tag is declared in the page with a `` element. 请注意，元素下面的元素 `` 是 `` 包含控件的元素 ，并设置了各种标记和属性来确定其外观和行为。Notice that below the `` element is an `` element that contains controls, and has a variety of tags and properties set to determine its appearance and behavior. 页面中的大部分代码演示了属性和方法的各种编程使用方式 。Most of the code in the page demonstrates the various programmatic uses of the properties and methods. [!code-aspx-csharp[WebParts_EditorZoneBase_Common#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/WebParts_EditorZoneBase_Common/CS/editorzonebasecs.aspx#1)] [!code-aspx-vb[WebParts_EditorZoneBase_Common#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/WebParts_EditorZoneBase_Common/VB/editorzonebasevb.aspx#1)] 此代码示例的第三部分是一个自定义 类，它演示如何处理多个 类成员。The third part of the code example is a custom class that shows how to work with a number of the class members. 自定义类派生自， 因此它可以与网页的声明性标记中的区域模板一起使用。The custom class derives from so that it can be used with a zone template in the declarative markup of the Web page. 要使代码示例运行，必须编译此源代码。For the code example to run, you must compile this source code. 可以显式编译该程序集，并将生成的程序集放在网站的 Bin 文件夹或全局程序集缓存中。You can compile it explicitly and put the resulting assembly in your Web site's Bin folder or the global assembly cache. 或者，您可以将源代码放在站点的 App_Code 文件夹中，它将在运行时动态编译。Alternatively, you can put the source code in your site's App_Code folder, where it will be dynamically compiled at run time. 此代码示例使用动态编译;因此，你会注意到 `Register` 网页顶部附近的指令未引用程序集文件。This code example uses dynamic compilation; thus, you will notice that the `Register` directive near the top of the Web page does not reference an assembly file. 有关演示两种编译方法的演练，请参阅 [演练：开发和使用自定义 Web 服务器控件](https://msdn.microsoft.com/library/6d90782a-a1a4-45a6-b2d4-cf6362b83b08)。For a walkthrough that demonstrates both methods of compiling, see [Walkthrough: Developing and Using a Custom Web Server Control](https://msdn.microsoft.com/library/6d90782a-a1a4-45a6-b2d4-cf6362b83b08). [!code-csharp[WebParts_EditorZoneBase_Common#12](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/WebParts_EditorZoneBase_Common/CS/myeditorzone.cs#12)] [!code-vb[WebParts_EditorZoneBase_Common#12](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/WebParts_EditorZoneBase_Common/VB/myeditorzone.vb#12)] 当你在浏览器中加载页面时，可以从下拉列表中选择 " **编辑模式** " 以切换到编辑模式。When you load the page in a browser, you can select **Edit Mode** from the drop-down list to switch to edit mode. 您可以单击谓词菜单 (两个控件的标题栏中的向下箭头) ，然后单击 " **编辑** " 以编辑控件。You can click the verbs menu (the downward arrow) in the title bar of one of the two controls, and click **Edit** to edit the control. 编辑 UI 可见时，可以看到类成员的各种声明性和编程使用的效果 。When the editing UI is visible, you can see the effects of the various declarative and programmatic uses of the class members.

para.span: 如果要开发用于承载控件的自定义区域 ，则必须确定是否要提供区域模板支持。

span.span: If you want to develop a custom zone for hosting controls, you must determine whether you want to provide zone template support.

para.span: 区域模板由实现接口的类型创建 ，如果要使页面开发人员能够使用自定义区域 在网页的声明性标记中引用区域中的控件，则这是必需的。

span.span: A zone template is created by types that implement the interface, and is necessary if you want to enable page developers using your custom zone to reference controls within your zone in the declarative markup of a Web page.

para.span: 如果需要区域模板支持，应从 类继承。

span.span: If you need zone template support, you should inherit from the class.

para.span: 相反，如果您的自定义区域及其 控件将是独立的，并且它们将以编程方式创建，而页面开发人员无需任何选项即可在区域模板中以声明方式指定控件，则可以直接从 类继承。

span.span: In contrast, if your custom zone and its controls are going to be self-contained, and they will be created programmatically without any options for page developers to specify controls declaratively in a zone template, then you can inherit directly from the class.

para.span: 如果执行此操作，则实现方法非常重要， 这样您的自定义区域将起作用。

span.span: If you do this, it is critical that you implement the method so that your custom zone will work.

related.span: 演练：在 Web 部件页上更改显示模式

span.span: Walkthrough: Changing Display Modes on a Web Parts Page
ASP.NET Web Parts Controls

MemberSignature.Value: .method familyhidebysig specialname rtspecialname instance void .ctor() cil managed

summary.span: 初始化该类供继承的类实例使用。

span.span: Initializes the class for use by an inherited class instance.

summary.span: 此构造函数只能由继承的类调用。

span.span: This constructor can only be called by an inherited class.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 当由继承的类调用时，此构造函数会将 对象传递给 控件，使页面能够显示编辑用户界面 (UI) 。This constructor, when invoked by an inherited class, passes a object to the control, which enables the page to display the editing user interface (UI).

span.span: ASP.NET Web Parts Controls

MemberSignature.Value: Public Overridable ReadOnly Property ApplyVerb As WebPartVerb

summary.span: 获取对 对象的引用，该对象使最终用户能够在编辑模式下应用对控件所做的编辑更改。

span.span: Gets a reference to a object that enables end users to apply editing changes to a control in edit mode.

value.span: 允许最终用户应用对控件所做的更改。

span.span: A that enables end users to apply changes to a control.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 应用谓词由 派生自类的控件的属性引用 。The apply verb is referenced by the property on a control derived from the class. Apply 谓词保存最终用户在编辑用户界面中所做的编辑更改 (UI) 到当前正在编辑的服务器控件。The apply verb saves editing changes that an end user has made in the editing user interface (UI) to a server control that is currently being edited. 默认情况下，应用谓词作为控件出现在 UI 中 。By default, the apply verb appears in the UI as a control. 按钮类型可以是图像、链接或实际按钮;您可以通过设置区域级别的继承属性，为区域中的所有谓词按钮 (而不是单个按钮) 。The type of button can be an image, a link, or an actual button; you can set this for all verb buttons in a zone (not for individual buttons) by setting the inherited property at the zone level. 应用谓词是一个区域级别的控件，这意味着，虽然可能有多个 控件，每个控件都在编辑模式下编辑服务器控件的一个或多个属性，所以应用谓词将全局应用于从 区域中的所有控件到服务器控件的所有更改。The apply verb is a zone-level control, which means that although there might be several controls, each editing one or more properties for the server control that is in edit mode, the apply verb works universally to apply all changes from all the controls in the zone to the server control. ## Examples 下面的代码示例演示如何以声明方式 和编程方式访问属性。The following code example demonstrates how to access the property both declaratively and programmatically. 有关运行此示例所需的完整代码，请参阅类概述主题的 "示例" 部分 。For the full code required to run the example, see the Example section of the class overview topic. 此代码示例的第一部分演示如何在网页中以 声明方式访问属性。The first part of the code example shows how to access the property declaratively in a Web page. 此示例自定义谓词的文本。This example customizes the text for the verb. [!code-aspx-csharp[WebParts_EditorZoneBase_Common#2](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/WebParts_EditorZoneBase_Common/CS/editorzonebasecs.aspx#2)] [!code-aspx-vb[WebParts_EditorZoneBase_Common#2](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/WebParts_EditorZoneBase_Common/VB/editorzonebasevb.aspx#2)] 该示例的第二部分演示如何 通过使用切换按钮来启用或禁用属性以编程方式访问属性。The second part of the example shows how to access the property programmatically, by using a toggle button to enable or disable it. [!code-csharp[WebParts_EditorZoneBase_Common#4](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/WebParts_EditorZoneBase_Common/CS/editorzonebasecs.aspx#4)] [!code-vb[WebParts_EditorZoneBase_Common#4](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/WebParts_EditorZoneBase_Common/VB/editorzonebasevb.aspx#4)] 当你在浏览器中加载页面时，可以在下拉列表控件中选择 " **编辑模式** " 以切换到编辑模式。When you load the page in a browser, you can select **Edit Mode** in the drop-down list control to switch to edit mode. 您可以单击谓词菜单 (某个控件的标题栏中的向下箭头) ，然后单击 " **编辑** " 以编辑选定的控件。You can click the verbs menu (the down arrow) in the title bar of one of the controls, and click **Edit** to edit the selected control. 当 控件和编辑 UI 可见时，可以看到表示 "应用" 谓词的按钮，然后单击 " **切换 ApplyVerb 启用** " 按钮启用或禁用它。When the control and editing UI are visible, you can see the button that represents the apply verb, and click the **Toggle ApplyVerb Enabled** button to enable or disable it.

span.span: ASP.NET Web Parts Controls

MemberSignature.Value: Public Overridable ReadOnly Property CancelVerb As WebPartVerb

summary.span: 获取对 对象的引用，该对象使最终用户能够取消在编辑模式下对控件所做的编辑更改。

span.span: Gets a reference to a object that enables end users to cancel editing changes to a control in edit mode.

value.span: 允许最终用户取消对控件所做的编辑更改。

span.span: A that enables end users to cancel editing changes to a control.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 取消谓词由 派生自类的控件的属性引用 。The cancel verb is referenced by the property on a control derived from the class. 取消谓词取消对最终用户在编辑用户界面 (UI) 中的服务器控件所做的编辑更改。The cancel verb cancels editing changes that an end user has made to a server control in the editing user interface (UI). 默认情况下，取消谓词作为控件出现在 UI 中 。By default, the cancel verb appears in the UI as a control. 按钮类型可以是图像、链接或实际按钮;您可以通过设置区域级别的继承属性，为区域中的所有谓词按钮 (而不是单个按钮) 。The type of button can be an image, a link, or an actual button; you can set this for all verb buttons in a zone (not for individual buttons) by setting the inherited property at the zone level. 当用户取消编辑更改时，控件中的任何更改 都不会应用于正在编辑的服务器控件。When a user cancels editing changes, none of the changes in the controls are applied to the server control that is being edited. 此外，页面仍处于编辑显示模式，但 控件将隐藏，并且不再选择所 编辑的控件。In addition, the page remains in edit display mode, but the controls are hidden and the control that was being edited is no longer selected. 这样一来，最终用户就可以选择另一个 控件进行编辑，而无需再次更改显示模式。This allows an end user to select another control to edit without having to change display modes again. 取消谓词是一个区域级别的控件，这意味着虽然可能有多个 控件，每个控件都在编辑模式下对服务器控件的一个或多个属性进行编辑，所以，cancel 谓词会广泛工作，以取消从区域中的所有控件进行的所有更改 。The cancel verb is a zone-level control, meaning that while there might be several controls, each editing one or more properties for the server control that is in edit mode, the cancel verb works universally to cancel all changes from all the controls in the zone. ## Examples 下面的代码示例演示如何以声明方式 和编程方式访问属性。The following code example demonstrates how to access the property both declaratively and programmatically. 有关运行此示例所需的完整代码，请参阅类概述主题的 "示例" 部分 。For the full code required to run the example, see the Example section of the class overview topic. 此代码示例的第一部分演示如何在网页中以 声明方式访问属性。The first part of the code example shows how to access the property declaratively in a Web page. 此示例自定义谓词的文本。This example customizes the text for the verb. [!code-aspx-csharp[WebParts_EditorZoneBase_Common#2](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/WebParts_EditorZoneBase_Common/CS/editorzonebasecs.aspx#2)] [!code-aspx-vb[WebParts_EditorZoneBase_Common#2](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/WebParts_EditorZoneBase_Common/VB/editorzonebasevb.aspx#2)] 该示例的第二部分演示如何 通过使用切换按钮来启用或禁用属性以编程方式访问属性。The second part of the example shows how to access the property programmatically, by using a toggle button to enable or disable it. [!code-csharp[WebParts_EditorZoneBase_Common#5](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/WebParts_EditorZoneBase_Common/CS/editorzonebasecs.aspx#5)] [!code-vb[WebParts_EditorZoneBase_Common#5](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/WebParts_EditorZoneBase_Common/VB/editorzonebasevb.aspx#5)] 当你在浏览器中加载页面时，可以在下拉列表控件中选择 " **编辑模式** " 以切换到编辑模式。When you load the page in a browser, you can select **Edit Mode** in the drop-down list control to switch to edit mode. 您可以单击谓词菜单 (某个控件的标题栏中的向下箭头) ，然后单击 " **编辑** " 以编辑选定的控件。You can click the verbs menu (the down arrow) in the title bar of one of the controls, and click **Edit** to edit the selected control. 当 控件和编辑 UI 可见时，可以看到表示取消谓词的按钮，并单击 " **切换 CancelVerb 启用** " 按钮启用或禁用该按钮。When the control and editing UI are visible, you can see the button that represents the cancel verb, and click the **Toggle CancelVerb Enabled** button to enable or disable it.

span.span: ASP.NET Web Parts Controls

MemberSignature.Value: .method familyhidebysig virtual instance void Close() cil managed

summary.span: 用户在区域的页眉中单击关闭谓词便可以调用此方法，此方法一经调用，就会结束编辑 控件的过程，并使 Web 部件页的显示模式返回到浏览模式。

span.span: Called when a user clicks a close verb in the header of a zone, this method ends the process of editing controls, and returns a Web Parts page's display mode to browse mode.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 方法为类中声明的基方法提供实现 。The method provides an implementation for the base method declared in the class. 实现只调用 方法，该方法执行结束编辑过程所需的步骤。The implementation simply calls the method, which carries out the steps necessary to end the editing process. 调用 方法会将该页返回到浏览模式，并取消对任何控件所做的任何编辑更改 。Calling the method returns the page to browse mode, and cancels any editing changes made to any controls.

span.span: ASP.NET Web Parts Controls

MemberSignature.Value: .method familyorassemblyhidebysig virtual instance void CreateChildControls() cil managed

summary.span: 创建与 区域关联的子控件集。

span.span: Creates the set of child controls associated with an zone.
ASP.NET Web Parts Controls

MemberSignature.Value: .method familyhidebysig newslot virtual instance class System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.EditorPartChrome CreateEditorPartChrome() cil managed
Protected Overridable Function CreateEditorPartChrome () As EditorPartChrome
abstract member CreateEditorPartChrome : unit -> System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.EditorPartChrome override this.CreateEditorPartChrome : unit -> System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.EditorPartChrome

summary.span: 获取对新的 对象的引用，该对象用于呈现 区域周围的外围用户界面 (UI) 元素。

span.span: Gets a reference to a new object used to render the peripheral user interface (UI) elements around an zone.

returns.span: 为区域呈现外围 UI 元素的 。

span.span: An that renders the peripheral UI elements for the zone.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 方法返回一个新的 对象。The method returns a new object. Chrome 包含以下外围用户界面元素，这些元素环绕 区域中的每个单独控件：边框、标题栏、标题栏中显示的项（包括可选图标、标题文本和谓词菜单）以及控件的页脚区中显示的项。Chrome includes the following peripheral UI elements that surround each individual control in the zone: a border; a title bar; the items that appear within the title bar, including optional icons, title text, and a verbs menu; and items appearing in the footer area of a control. 方法使用返回的 对象围绕每个控件创建镶边 。The method uses the returned object to create the chrome around each control.

para.span: 方法可在派生类中重写，以提供不同的实现。

span.span: The method can be overridden in a derived class to provide a different implementation.

para.span: 例如，你可以创建一个自定义 类，使你能够更好地控制编辑 UI 的呈现和外观。

span.span: For example, you might create a customized class to give you more control over the rendering and appearance of the editing UI.

para.span: 如果在 派生区域中重写方法，则可以 在重写的方法中创建自定义对象。

span.span: If you override the method in a derived zone, you could create your custom object in the overridden method.
ASP.NET Web Parts Controls

MemberSignature.Value: .method familyhidebysig newslot virtual instance class System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.EditorPartCollection CreateEditorParts() cil managed
Protected MustOverride Function CreateEditorParts () As EditorPartCollection

summary.span: 提供一个基方法声明，派生的区域可以重写该声明，以便处理创建 控件的详细信息，这些控件包含在某个区域中。

span.span: Provides a base method declaration that derived zones can override to handle the details of creating the controls contained in a zone.

returns.span: 包含 控件集合的 ，这些控件与区域关联。

span.span: An that contains the collection of controls associated with the zone.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 方法不提供实现。The method provides no implementation. 它应在派生类中实现，并且应用于在 承载网页进入编辑模式时创建区域中包含的控件集合的实例。It is intended to be implemented in a derived class, and should be used to create an instance of the collection of controls contained in a zone, whenever the hosting Web page enters edit mode. 方法提供方法的实现的一个示例 。The method provides one example of an implementation of the method.

span.span: ASP.NET Web Parts Controls

MemberSignature.Value: Protected Overrides ReadOnly Property Display As Boolean
protected: virtual property bool Display { bool get(); };

summary.span: 获取一个值，该值指示 控件当前是否正在显示。

span.span: Gets a value that indicates whether a control is currently displayed.

value.span: 如果 当前正在显示，则为 ；否则为 。

span.span: if the is currently displayed; otherwise, .
The default value is .

MemberSignature.Value: Public ReadOnly Property EditorPartChrome As EditorPartChrome

summary.span: 获取对 类的实例的引用，该类与 区域关联。

span.span: Gets a reference to the instance of the class associated with the zone.

value.span: 对于某个区域中 控件的 chrome 元素，包含其样式属性的 。

span.span: An that contains style characteristics for the chrome elements of controls in a zone.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 属性提供对 与区域关联的对象的引用。The property provides a reference to the object associated with a zone. 调用方法时，它将创建类的一个实例 ，此实例用于呈现外围用户界面 (UI) 元素 (也称为区域中所有控件的 chrome) 。When the method is called, it creates an instance of the class, and this instance is used to render the peripheral user interface (UI) elements (also called the chrome) for all controls in the zone. 单个控件的 chrome 元素 包括其边框和标题区域中的其他项，例如谓词、图标和标题文本，以及其页脚区域及其包含的元素。The chrome elements for an individual control include its border and other items in its header area, such as verbs, icons, and title text, as well as its footer area and its included elements.

span.span: ASP.NET Web Parts Controls

MemberSignature.Value: Public ReadOnly Property EditorParts As EditorPartCollection

summary.span: 获取 区域中包含的所有 控件的集合。

span.span: Gets a collection of all the controls contained in an zone.

value.span: 包含某个区域中所有单个 控件的 。

span.span: An that contains all the individual controls in a zone.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 属性提供对区域中所有控件的集合的引用 。The property provides a reference to a collection of all the controls in the zone. 它同时引用 随 Web 部件控件集提供的控件以及 添加到该区域中的任何自定义控件。It references both the controls provided with the Web Parts control set, and any custom controls that are added to the zone. 由于该集合是只读的，因此，如果开发人员要创建 用于常规编辑的自定义控件，并将其添加到集合中，则应重写 方法。Because the collection is read-only, developers who want to create custom controls for general editing purposes and add them to the collection should override the method. 如果设计自定义 控件以编辑特定 控件，则应 在控件中重写接口的成员-- 方法和 属性 。If you design custom controls to edit a specific control, you should override the members of the interface--the method and the property--in the control. 重写这些成员的原因是使 控件能够 在编辑控件时创建自定义控件并将它们添加到 集合中，并向编辑控件提供对 其正在编辑的控件的对象引用。The reason to override these members is to enable your control to create the custom controls and add them to the collection when your control is being edited, and to provide the editing controls with an object reference to the control they are editing. 如果要添加自定义 控件以编辑不是从类继承的服务器控件 ，则必须 在类中实现接口，就像为控件实现一样 。If you want to add a custom control to edit a server control that does not inherit from the class, you must implement the interface in the class just as you would for a control. > [!NOTE] > 请注意， 在方法的实现中添加到控件集合的任何都 必须为其 ID 属性分配一个值，否则，在将集合分配给属性时会引发异常 。Note that any that is added to the collection of controls in an implementation of the method must have a value assigned to its ID property, otherwise an exception will be thrown when the collection is assigned to the property. ## Examples 下面的代码示例演示如何以 编程方式访问属性。The following code example demonstrates how to access the property programmatically. 有关运行此示例所需的完整代码，请参阅类概述主题的 "示例" 部分 。For the full code required to run the example, see the Example section of the class overview topic. 此代码示例的第一部分演示 属性包含对在网页 中以声明方式引用的所有控件的引用。The first part of the code example demonstrates that the property contains references to all the controls that are referenced declaratively in the Web page. [!code-aspx-csharp[WebParts_EditorZoneBase_Common#2](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/WebParts_EditorZoneBase_Common/CS/editorzonebasecs.aspx#2)] [!code-aspx-vb[WebParts_EditorZoneBase_Common#2](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/WebParts_EditorZoneBase_Common/VB/editorzonebasevb.aspx#2)] 此代码示例的第二部分以编程方式访问 属性，并列出控件中每个控件的 ID 。The second part of the code example programmatically accesses the property and lists the ID of each control in a control. [!code-csharp[WebParts_EditorZoneBase_Common#6](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/WebParts_EditorZoneBase_Common/CS/editorzonebasecs.aspx#6)] [!code-vb[WebParts_EditorZoneBase_Common#6](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/WebParts_EditorZoneBase_Common/VB/editorzonebasevb.aspx#6)] 当你在浏览器中加载页面时，可以单击 " **显示 EditorParts 集合** " 按钮，以列出 属性中引用的所有控件的 id 。When you load the page in a browser, you can click the **Display EditorParts Collection** button to list the IDs of all the controls referenced in the property.

exception.span: 要添加到集合的 的 ID 属性尚未赋值。

span.span: An being added to the collection does not have a value assigned to its ID property.
ASP.NET Web Parts Controls

span.span: Gets or sets a message that appears when a zone contains no controls.

value.span: 一个字符串，其中包含在空区域中显示的消息。

span.span: A string containing the message that appears in an empty zone.

value.span: 默认的区域性特定字符串由 .NET Framework 提供。

member this.ErrorText : string with get, set

summary.span: 获取或设置要在编辑用户界面 (UI) 顶部显示的区域级错误消息的文本。

span.span: Gets or sets the text of a zone-level error message to display at the top of the editing user interface (UI).

value.span: 包含错误消息的本地化字符串。

span.span: A localized string that contains the error message.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 属性包含错误消息的文本，如果在呈现从类派生的控件时出现错误，则可以在 UI 中显示该错误消息的文本 。The property contains the text of an error message that can be displayed in the UI if an error occurs while rendering controls derived from the class. 如果区域中包含的任何单个控件出现错误，则会在区域顶部显示错误消息 。The error message is displayed at the top of the zone if an error occurs in any of the individual controls contained in the zone. 此外，单个 控件可以在接收错误的控件附近显示其自己的错误消息。In addition, individual controls can display their own error messages near the control that receives an error. 设置此属性后，可以使用设计器工具自动将此属性的值保存到资源文件中。The value of this property, when set, can be saved automatically to a resource file by using a designer tool. 有关详细信息，请参阅 和 [全球化和本地化](https://docs.microsoft.com/previous-versions/aspnet/c6zyy3s9(v=vs.100))。For more information, see and [Globalization and Localization](https://docs.microsoft.com/previous-versions/aspnet/c6zyy3s9(v=vs.100)).

MemberSignature.Value: .method familyhidebysig instance void InvalidateEditorParts() cil managed

summary.span: 将与 区域关联的 控件集合设置为 ，从而调用 方法重新创建集合。

span.span: Sets the collection of controls associated with an zone to , which results in the method being called to recreate the collection.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 如果 与某个区域关联的控件列表 由于某种原因而发生更改，则派生类可以调用方法，并且派生类需要获取已更新的 控件列表。The method can be called by derived classes if the list of controls associated with an zone has changed for some reason, and the derived class needs to get an updated list of controls. 派生类应调用 ，它将当前集合设置为 `null` 。The derived class should call , which sets the current collection to `null`. 下次访问该集合时 ，Web 部件控件集会自动调用 方法以创建更新的集合。The next time that the collection is accessed, the Web Parts control set automatically invokes the method to create the updated collection.

span.span: ASP.NET Web Parts Controls

MemberSignature.Value: .method familyhidebysig virtual instance void LoadViewState(object savedState) cil managed
Protected Overrides Sub LoadViewState (savedState As Object)

span.span: The previously saved state.

summary.span: 为某个区域加载以前保存的状态信息。

span.span: Loads previously saved state information for a zone.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 此方法主要由 .NET Framework 基础结构使用，不应在代码中直接使用。This method is used primarily by the .NET Framework infrastructure and is not intended to be used directly from your code. 不过，控件开发人员可以重写此方法，以指定自定义服务器控件如何还原其视图状态。However, control developers can override this method to specify how a custom server control restores its view state. 有关详细信息，请参阅 [ASP.NET 状态管理概述](https://docs.microsoft.com/previous-versions/aspnet/75x4ha6s(v=vs.100))。For more information, see [ASP.NET State Management Overview](https://docs.microsoft.com/previous-versions/aspnet/75x4ha6s(v=vs.100)). 方法将重写基方法，以检查是否正在加载页面，因为在区域中单击了 "确定" 谓词、"取消" 谓词或 "应用谓词"。The method overrides the base method to check whether the page is being loaded because an OK verb, a cancel verb, or an apply verb was clicked in the zone. 如果是这样，则该方法处理与各自的各个方案关联的状态。If so, the method handles the state associated with each respective scenario.

exception.span: 对象的大小与当前视图状态对象的大小不相等。

span.span: The size of the object does not equal the size of the current view-state object.
ASP.NET Web Parts Controls

MemberSignature.Value: Public Overridable ReadOnly Property OKVerb As WebPartVerb

summary.span: 获取对 对象的引用，该对象将应用在编辑模式下对控件所做的编辑更改，并隐藏编辑用户界面 (UI)。

span.span: Gets a reference to a object that applies editing changes to a control in edit mode, and hides the editing user interface (UI).

value.span: 应用对控件所做的编辑更改，并隐藏编辑 UI 的 。

span.span: A that applies editing changes to a control and hides the editing UI.

remarks.format: ## Remarks OK 谓词由 派生自类的控件的属性引用 。The OK verb is referenced by the property on a control derived from the class. 它类似于应用谓词，在用户单击它时，它将应用用户对服务器控件所做的编辑更改。It is similar to the apply verb, in that when a user clicks it, it applies editing changes that the user has made to a server control. 此外，编辑控件处于隐藏状态，无法 再选择要编辑的控件 (允许用户编辑其他控件) ，而页面仍处于编辑模式。In addition, the editing controls are hidden, the control that was being edited is no longer selected (which allows the user to edit another control), and the page remains in edit mode. 默认情况下，OK 谓词作为控件出现在 UI 中 。By default, the OK verb appears in the UI as a control. 按钮类型可以是图像、链接或实际按钮;您可以通过设置区域级别的继承属性，为区域中的所有谓词按钮 (而不是单个按钮) 。The type of button can be an image, a link, or an actual button; you can set this for all verb buttons in a zone (not for individual buttons) by setting the inherited property at the zone level. OK 谓词是一个区域级别的控件，这意味着虽然可能有多个 控件，每个控件都在编辑模式下对服务器控件的一个或多个属性进行编辑，但 OK 谓词的工作方式是将所有更改应用于 区域中的所有控件，并隐藏除区域本身之外的所有控件。The OK verb is a zone-level control, meaning that while there might be several controls, each editing one or more properties for the server control that is in edit mode, the OK verb works universally to apply all changes from all the controls in the zone, and to hide all the controls except for the zone itself. ## Examples 下面的代码示例演示如何以声明方式 和编程方式访问属性。The following code example demonstrates how to access the property both declaratively and programmatically. 有关运行此示例所需的完整代码，请参阅类概述主题的 "示例" 部分 。For the full code required to run the example, see the Example section of the class overview topic. 此代码示例的第一部分演示如何在网页中以 声明方式访问属性。The first part of the code example shows how to access the property declaratively in a Web page. 此示例自定义谓词的文本。This example customizes the text for the verb. [!code-aspx-csharp[WebParts_EditorZoneBase_Common#2](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/WebParts_EditorZoneBase_Common/CS/editorzonebasecs.aspx#2)] [!code-aspx-vb[WebParts_EditorZoneBase_Common#2](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/WebParts_EditorZoneBase_Common/VB/editorzonebasevb.aspx#2)] 该示例的第二部分演示如何 通过使用切换按钮来启用或禁用它以编程方式访问。The second part of the example shows how to access the programmatically, by using a toggle button to enable or disable it. [!code-csharp[WebParts_EditorZoneBase_Common#7](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/WebParts_EditorZoneBase_Common/CS/editorzonebasecs.aspx#7)] [!code-vb[WebParts_EditorZoneBase_Common#7](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/WebParts_EditorZoneBase_Common/VB/editorzonebasevb.aspx#7)] 当你在浏览器中加载页面时，可以在下拉列表控件中选择 " **编辑模式** " 以切换到编辑模式。When you load the page in a browser, you can select **Edit Mode** in the drop-down list control to switch to edit mode. 您可以单击谓词菜单 (某个控件的标题栏中的向下箭头) ，然后单击 " **编辑** " 以编辑选定的控件。You can click the verbs menu (the down arrow) in the title bar of one of the controls, and click **Edit** to edit the selected control. 当 控件和编辑 UI 可见时，可以看到表示 "确定" 谓词的按钮，并单击 " **切换 OKVerb 启用** " 按钮启用或禁用该按钮。When the control and editing UI are visible, you can see the button that represents the OK verb, and click the **Toggle OKVerb Enabled** button to enable or disable it.

span.span: ASP.NET Web Parts Controls

span.span: An that raises the event.
A that contains the event data.

summary.span: 引发 事件并破坏区域中的所有 和子控件，以便为网页进入或退出编辑显示模式作准备。

span.span: Raises the event and destroys all and child controls in the zone in preparation for a Web page to enter or exit the edit display mode.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 方法为类中的基方法提供实现 。The method provides an implementation for the base method in the class. 此方法的主要目的 是准备网页以进入或退出编辑显示模式。The main purpose of the method is to prepare a Web page to enter or exit the edit display mode. 方法会销毁区域中包含的所有控件，然后调用基方法，这会引发 控件中的事件 。The method destroys all controls contained in the zone and then calls the base method, which raises the event in the control. ## Examples 下面的代码示例演示如何 在派生类中重写方法。The following code example demonstrates how to override the method in a derived class. 有关运行此示例所需的完整代码，请参阅类概述主题的 "示例" 部分 。For the full code required to run the example, see the Example section of the class overview topic. 自定义编辑器区域派生自 类，因此它可以与网页的声明性标记中的区域模板一起使用。The custom editor zone derives from the class so that it can be used with a zone template in the declarative markup of the Web page. 自定义类将重写 方法，将区域的背景色设置为指定的颜色，然后调用基方法，该基方法会销毁所有子级和 控件，以准备进入或退出编辑显示模式。The custom class overrides the method, setting the background color of the zone to a specified color, and then calls the base method, which destroys all child and controls in preparation for entering or exiting edit display mode. [!code-csharp[WebParts_EditorZoneBase_Common#13](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/WebParts_EditorZoneBase_Common/CS/myeditorzone.cs#13)] [!code-vb[WebParts_EditorZoneBase_Common#13](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/WebParts_EditorZoneBase_Common/VB/myeditorzone.vb#13)] 当你在浏览器中加载页面时，可以在下拉列表控件中选择 " **编辑模式** " 以切换到编辑模式。When you load the page in a browser, you can select **Edit Mode** in the drop-down list control to switch to edit mode. 您可以单击谓词菜单 (某个控件的标题栏中的向下箭头) ，然后单击 " **编辑** " 以编辑选定的控件。You can click the verbs menu (the down arrow) in the title bar of one of the controls, and click **Edit** to edit the selected control. 当 控件和编辑用户界面 (UI) 可见时，可以看到该区域具有代码中指定的背景色。When the control and editing user interface (UI) are visible, you can see that the zone has the background color specified in the code.

para.span: 可以在从 类或类继承的自定义编辑器区域控件中以编程方式重写或调用方法 。

span.span: The method can be overridden or called programmatically in a custom editor zone control that inherits from the class or the class.
ASP.NET Web Parts Controls

span.span: An that raises the event.
A that contains the event data.

summary.span: 引发 事件，并在区域中将 集合设置为 ，以便为 控件进入或退出编辑模式作准备。

span.span: Raises the event and sets the collection to in the zone in preparation for a control to enter or exit edit mode.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 使用 方法，您可以为单个 控件进入或退出编辑模式时发生的事件提供自定义处理。The method enables you to provide custom handling for the event that occurs when an individual control enters or exits edit mode. ## Examples 下面的代码示例演示如何 在派生类中重写方法。The following code example demonstrates how to override the method in a derived class. 有关运行此示例所需的完整代码，请参阅类概述主题的 "示例" 部分 。For the full code required to run the example, see the Example section of the class overview topic. 自定义编辑器区域派生自 类，因此它可以与网页的声明性标记中的区域模板一起使用。The custom editor zone derives from the class so that it can be used with a zone template in the declarative markup of the Web page. 自定义类将重写 方法，设置要编辑的特定控件的背景色，然后调用基方法。The custom class overrides the method, setting the background color of the specific control that is being edited, and then calls the base method. [!code-csharp[WebParts_EditorZoneBase_Common#14](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/WebParts_EditorZoneBase_Common/CS/myeditorzone.cs#14)] [!code-vb[WebParts_EditorZoneBase_Common#14](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/WebParts_EditorZoneBase_Common/VB/myeditorzone.vb#14)] 当你在浏览器中加载页面时，可以在下拉列表控件中选择 " **编辑模式** " 以切换到编辑模式。When you load the page in a browser, you can select **Edit Mode** in the drop-down list control to switch to edit mode. 您可以单击谓词菜单 (某个控件的标题栏中的向下箭头) ，然后单击 " **编辑** " 以编辑选定的控件。You can click the verbs menu (the down arrow) in the title bar of one of the controls, and click **Edit** to edit the selected control. 当 和编辑用户界面 (UI) 可见时，可以看到所选控件具有代码中指定的背景色。When the and editing user interface (UI) are visible, you can see that the selected control has the background color specified in the code.

para.span: 可以在从 类或类继承的自定义编辑器区域控件中以编程方式重写或调用方法 。

span.span: The method can be overridden or called programmatically in a custom editor zone control that inherits from the class or the class.

span.span: A that contains the argument for the event.

summary.span: 执行与某一区域谓词关联的操作，或引发发布回服务器的事件。

span.span: Carries out the actions associated with one of the zone verbs, or raises an event that posts back to the server.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 如果在用户界面中单击了这些谓词中的一个谓词 (UI) ，则该方法执行与 OK 谓词、取消谓词或应用谓词相关联的各个操作。The method carries out the respective actions associated with the OK verb, the cancel verb, or the apply verb, if one of these verbs was clicked in the user interface (UI). 否则，它会引发回发到服务器的事件。Otherwise, it raises an event that posts back to the server.

protected public: override void Render(System::Web::UI::HtmlTextWriter ^ writer);

span.span: The that receives the zone's content.

summary.span: 将区域呈现给指定的 对象。

span.span: Renders the zone to the specified object.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 方法会重写类中的基方法 ，以调用 方法，这将验证是否在运行时为区域控件呈现 HTML 窗体。The method overrides the base method from the class to call the method, which verifies that an HTML form is rendered for the zone control at run time. 验证完成后，该方法将调用基方法以呈现区域的全部内容。After the verification, the method then calls the base method to render the full contents of the zone.

span.span: ASP.NET Web Parts Controls

MemberSignature.Value: .method familyhidebysig virtual instance void RenderBody(class System.Web.UI.HtmlTextWriter writer) cil managed
Protected Overrides Sub RenderBody (writer As HtmlTextWriter)

param.name: writer
param.span: 接收区域的正文内容的 。

span.span: The that receives the zone's body content.

summary.span: 重写基方法，以便呈现某个区域的正文区，该区域从 类派生。

span.span: Overrides the base method to render the body area of a zone derived from the class.

remarks.format:
## Remarks 方法呈现区域的正文区 ，该区域是页眉和页脚区之间的主要内容区域，包含 控件。The method renders the body area of an zone, which is the main content area between the header and footer areas and contains controls. 方法会重写类中的基方法， 以提供专门呈现，用于寻址仅适用于区域的布局和样式特性 。The method overrides the base method in the class to provide specialized rendering that addresses layout and style attributes that apply only to zones. 方法将呈现一个表，其中包含正文的全部内容，并根据各种条件（包括页面的当前显示模式）设置不同的属性值。The method renders a table that contains the entire contents of the body, and within that table, it sets different attribute values depending on various conditions, including the current display mode of the page. 如果没有包含的控件，它将呈现属性的值 。If there are no contained controls, it renders the value of the property. ## Examples 下面的代码示例演示如何 在派生类中重写方法。The following code example demonstrates how to override the method in a derived class. 有关运行此示例所需的完整代码，请参阅类概述主题的 "示例" 部分 。For the full code required to run the example, see the Example section of the class overview topic. 自定义编辑器区域派生自 类，因此它可以与网页的声明性标记中的区域模板一起使用。The custom editor zone derives from the class so that it can be used with a zone template in the declarative markup of the Web page. 自定义类将重写 方法，并添加一个 HTML `
` 元素以在区域的标头和正文之间创建一行。The custom class overrides the method, adding an HTML `
` element to create a line between the header and body of the zone. 然后，它调用基方法以呈现区域的其余正文内容。It then calls the base method to render the rest of the zone's body contents. [!code-csharp[WebParts_EditorZoneBase_Common#15](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/WebParts_EditorZoneBase_Common/CS/myeditorzone.cs#15)] [!code-vb[WebParts_EditorZoneBase_Common#15](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/WebParts_EditorZoneBase_Common/VB/myeditorzone.vb#15)] 当你在浏览器中加载页面时，可以在下拉列表控件中选择 " **编辑模式** " 以切换到编辑模式。When you load the page in a browser, you can select **Edit Mode** in the drop-down list control to switch to edit mode. 您可以单击谓词菜单 (某个控件的标题栏中的向下箭头) ，然后单击 " **编辑** " 以编辑选定的控件。You can click the verbs menu (the down arrow) in the title bar of one of the controls, and click **Edit** to edit the selected control. 当 控件和编辑用户界面 (UI) 可见时，可以看到在编辑器区域的标头和正文之间创建的行。When the control and editing user interface (UI) are visible, you can see the line created between the header and body of the editor zone.

summary.span: 呈现在区域级应用的谓词。

span.span: Renders the verbs that apply at the zone level.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 方法将呈现其操作适用于整个区域的谓词： OK 谓词、cancel 谓词和 apply 谓词。The method renders the verbs whose actions apply to the entire zone: the OK verb, the cancel verb, and the apply verb. 这些谓词在 、 和属性中引用 。These verbs are referenced in the , , and properties. ## Examples 下面的代码示例演示如何 在派生类中重写方法。The following code example demonstrates how to override the method in a derived class. 有关运行此示例所需的完整代码，请参阅类概述主题的 "示例" 部分 。For the full code required to run the example, see the Example section of the class overview topic. 自定义编辑器区域派生自 类，因此它可以与网页的声明性标记中的区域模板一起使用。The custom editor zone derives from the class so that it can be used with a zone template in the declarative markup of the Web page. 自定义类将重写 方法，并向 每个区域级别谓词的属性的现有值添加一些文本。The custom class overrides the method, adding some text to the existing value of the property for each of the zone-level verbs. 然后，它调用基方法以呈现所有谓词。It then calls the base method to render all the verbs. [!code-csharp[WebParts_EditorZoneBase_Common#16](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/WebParts_EditorZoneBase_Common/CS/myeditorzone.cs#16)] [!code-vb[WebParts_EditorZoneBase_Common#16](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/WebParts_EditorZoneBase_Common/VB/myeditorzone.vb#16)] 当你在浏览器中加载页面时，可以在下拉列表控件中选择 " **编辑模式** " 以切换到编辑模式。When you load the page in a browser, you can select **Edit Mode** in the drop-down list control to switch to edit mode. 您可以单击谓词菜单 (某个控件的标题栏中的向下箭头) ，然后单击 " **编辑** " 以编辑选定的控件。You can click the verbs menu (the down arrow) in the title bar of one of the controls, and click **Edit** to edit the selected control. 当 (UI) 的控件和编辑用户界面可见时，可以在区域底部的区域级别谓词的按钮上看到文本已更改。When the control and editing user interface (UI) are visible, you can see the text has been changed on the buttons for the zone-level verbs at the bottom of the zone.

MemberSignature.Value: .method familyhidebysig virtual instance object SaveViewState() cil managed
Protected Overrides Function SaveViewState () As Object

summary.span: 将页面发布回服务器之后，保存已发生的所有视图状态的更改。

span.span: Saves any view-state changes that have occurred after a page was posted back to the server.

returns.span: 返回区域控件的当前视图状态。

span.span: Returns the zone control's current view state.

returns.span: 如果没有与区域关联的视图状态，此方法将返回 。

span.span: If no view state is associated with the zone, this method returns .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 方法调用基方法以保存视图状态，并保存与 "应用"、"取消" 和 "确定" 谓词关联的任何视图状态。The method calls the base method to save view state, and then also saves any view state associated with the apply, cancel, and OK verbs.

span.span: ASP.NET Web Parts Controls

MemberSignature.Value: .method familyhidebysig virtual instance void TrackViewState() cil managed

summary.span: 曲目更改为区域控件的视图状态。

span.span: Tracks changes to a zone control's view state.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 方法首先调用基方法来跟踪与区域关联的视图状态 ，然后开始跟踪应用、取消和正常谓词的视图状态。The method first calls the base method to track view state associated with an zone, and then begins tracking view state for the apply, cancel, and OK verbs.

span.span: ASP.NET Web Parts Controls

MemberSignature.Value: Protected ReadOnly Property WebPartToEdit As WebPart

summary.span: 获取对当前正在编辑的 控件的引用。

span.span: Gets a reference to the control that is currently being edited.

value.span: 当前处于编辑模式中的 。

span.span: A that is currently in edit mode.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 一次只能编辑一个控件，当控件处于编辑模式时， 属性提供对该控件的引用。Only one control can be edited at a time, and when a control is in edit mode, the property provides a reference to that control. 引用的控件与属性所引用的控件相同 。The control referenced is the same as the control that is referenced by the property. 因此，当前正在编辑的控件始终处于选定状态。Therefore, a control that is currently being edited is always currently selected.

para.span: 受保护的 属性只能在派生类中访问，派生类可以对基类调用此属性， 以获取对正在编辑的当前控件的对象引用。

span.span: The protected property is accessible only in derived classes, which can call this property on the base class to get an object reference to the current control being edited.
ASP.NET Web Parts Controls
